name: Hundred Years' War
description: A series of conflicts between the Kingdom of England and the Kingdom of France and their allies

name: War of 1812
description: A conflict between the United States and the United Kingdom, its North American colonies, and its Native American allies

name: World War I
description: A global conflict between the Allies and the Central Powers, also known as the Great War

name: Vietnam War
description: A conflict in Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia between North Vietnam and its allies against South Vietnam and its allies

name: First Nuclear Weapon used on Hiroshima
description: First atomic bomb used in warfare over Hiroshima, marking the beginning of the nuclear age.

name: Second Nuclear Weapon used on Nagasaki
description: The second and final atomic bomb used in warfare over Nagasaki
